title: UCP Capability
description: Schema for UCP capabilities and extensions. Extensions are capabilities with an 'extends' field. Uses reverse-domain naming for governance.

name.description: Stable capability identifier in reverse-domain notation (e.g., dev.ucp.shopping.checkout). Used in capability negotiation.

schema.description: URL to JSON Schema for this capability's payload.

extends.description: Parent capability this extends. Present for extensions, absent for root capabilities.

config.description: Capability-specific configuration (structure defined by each capability).

discovery.title: Capability (Discovery)
discovery.description: Full capability declaration for discovery profiles. Includes spec/schema URLs for agent fetching.

response.title: Capability (Response)
response.description: Capability reference in responses. Only name/version required to confirm active capabilities.
